verses.roman:
tabe sei yavanere āmi ta' puchila
hindu 'hari' bale, tāra svabhāva jānila

synonyms: tabe—then; sei—that; yavanere—from the meat-eaters; āmi—I; ta'-certainly; puchila—inquired; hindu—the Hindu; hari bale—says Hari; tara—his; svabhāva—nature; jānila—I know.
translation: "I then inquired from these yavanas, 'I know that these Hindus by nature chant "Hari, Hari."
